lines:
39 Peterboro st

wan

Kwan 
Dear Dr.

224 006 Berlin Mars

Jan KR, 1918

.

I am so sorry to

go new gak this Friday. 
I have just finished a letter 
to mard Legnole expressing my 
regret for not being able to " 
visit te

planned. However, 
I shall by to sum in to Andover 
as soon as I find time after 
my relum in te 5 st.

My mid-year ordeals 
are coming to an end. My last

er

a
raw: 39 Peterboro st wan Kwan Dear Dr. 224 006 Berlin Mars Jan KR, 1918 . I am so sorry to go new gak this Friday. I have just finished a letter to mard Legnole expressing my regret for not being able to " visit te planned. However, I shall by to sum in to Andover as soon as I find time after my relum in te 5 st. My mid-year ordeals are coming to an end. My last er a

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that Kwan will not be visiting Mrs. Lynde as planned and that Tommy (Lee) has not received money from home. Kwan asks for advice.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
